author: slebresne
msg: Fix potential NPE during read repair
patch by slebresne; reviewed by jbellis for CASSANDRA-2823

author: castagna
msg: This is a workaround when someone uses an assembler with ja:textIndex in it with the larqbuilder command. If someone else has a lock on the Lucene index we fall back to a read-only mode. See: http://markmail.org/message/7beyagp6vtvxduy3

author: castagna
msg: Thanks FindBugs (it can be embarassing, but it is useful sometimes).
